The Disputes System  provide the user the ability to create or initiate a ticket retrieval request. As part of ticket retrieval creation process the  must prompt the user to enter all the required information to create the ticket retrieval request. The ticket retrieval request is a document that is sent to merchant inquiring the validity of a transaction.

The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval s. The three types of ticket retrieval s  ( Request  original receipt (2 Request  a copy of the receipt or (3 Request  a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.
The Disputes System must prevent external users from requesting original receipts. Requests for original receipts are restricted to internal users.
